cast.overview: A pair of teenage girls in rural Pennsylvania travel to New York City to seek out medical help after an unintended pregnancy.
cast.title: Never Rarely Sometimes Always

details.biography: Drew Seltzer is a versatile Meisner trained actor, who received his BFA from Rutgers University and The Globe Theater in London. He is also trained extensively in Improv from Second City and Improv LA! His recurring role as Dale Harmon on the second season of the David Fincher TV series “Mindhunter”, is currently streaming on Netflix. Most recent HBO/MAX film “Never Rarely Sometimes Always” was nominated for 7 Independent Spirit Awards including Best Picture. "Seltzer's deeply felt portrayal is Extraordinar
details.name: Drew Seltzer
